description:
UPDATE: Added Music to the game.
UPDATE: Added 4 built-in difficulty levels
UPDATE: Fixed "too many cards" memory issue as per user reviews.

Thank You all for the reviews. I am glad you are enjoying the game.

Are you ready to take control?

Traffic intensity is rising in the peaceful suburb and rush hour is approaching. Control the traffic by strategically stopping and accelerating these vehicles by tapping these vehicles. It may sound easy but controlling them is no easy task.

Directions:
Touch Vehicles to stop them but beware untouch will accelerate them. 

Levels:
The game comes built in with 4 difficulty levels. These levels get activated at scores 50,100,250,500 and higher. 

Enjoy the advertisement free version of Traffic Mayhem for free. I hope you enjoy the game.
